title: Beacon: Disaster Response Platform
description: Collaborated with Salesforce to develop Beacon, a technology platform for disaster response and resilience. Built critical communication infrastructure enabling coordination between emergency responders, relief organizations, and affected communities during crisis situations. Integrated secure data systems to maintain operational continuity under adverse conditions.

title: Ovation TV Creative Studio
description: Partnered with Ovation TV and will.i.am to launch a creative studio initiative supporting emerging artists and innovators. Built crowdfunding infrastructure and digital platform connecting creators with audiences and funding opportunities.

title: Chrysler Innovation Challenge
description: Designed and executed Chrysler's innovation crowdfunding challenge, identifying and supporting automotive technology entrepreneurs. Platform enabled community-driven innovation in vehicle design, sustainability, and manufacturing processes.

title: A&E Network: Project Startup
description: Technology partner for A&E's Project Startup, a reality show featuring entrepreneurs competing for funding and mentorship. Built the crowdfunding platform integrating viewer engagement with real capital deployment.

title: YALI - Young African Leaders Initiative
partner: White House × U.S. Department of State
description: Selected as technology partner for President Obama's Young African Leaders Initiative, building crowdfunding and entrepreneurship programs supporting the next generation of African innovators and changemakers across the continent.

title: Venture for America
description: Partnered with Venture for America and American Express to support recent college graduates working in startups. Created funding mechanisms and mentorship programs connecting talented entrepreneurs with resources and capital.

title: FreshDirect: Next Big Food Thing
description: Developed "Next Big Food Thing" crowdfunding initiative with FreshDirect, enabling food entrepreneurs and culinary innovators to bring new products to market through community-backed validation and distribution partnerships.
